评论详情: Size not for men like description. Sized for a female. Style, softness , color great.  Time will tell about quality and value for money.  Delivery time was awful.

My daughter really likes this zip-up hoodie but she said it does run a little small. It is really cute and well made. I have washed it and dried it and it doesn’t look dingy or like it shrunk but it definitely isn’t oversized. I still think I would have no issue buying it again but I would probably size up next time for more of an oversized fit maybe even go up 2 sizes.
No issues with it my son loved it.

This hoodie is so comfortable and stylish! The soft, breathable fabric makes it perfect for fall, and the oversized design adds a trendy vibe. It’s versatile for lounging or casual outings, and it’s a great gift idea too. Love it!
I love the quality and look of this jacket The fit is perfect. I would highly recommend.
Nothing

Grandson absolutely loves it but he’s only 11. Extremely thin material and the zipper is cheap and I’m sure it will break soon. I’d never buy again as it is cheap and not worth the money. But as I earlier stated my grandson loves it so if he’s happy than I’m happy.
For a 2xl I would've expected a loose fit, but no, it fit like a L at best. Super thin material which is okay ig considering the price.

This Y2K hoodie is a must-have for anyone into trendy streetwear! The unisex design makes it perfect for both women and men, and the aesthetic vibe gives it that cool, nostalgic Y2K style. It’s soft, comfortable, and perfect for layering or wearing on its own. The quality is great, and it pairs well with jeans or leggings for a laid-back, stylish look. Whether you’re lounging or out with friends, this hoodie adds that perfect touch to your outfit!

This isn't a hoodie for winter. This is more of a spring/summer hoodie because it's 100% polyester so keep that in mind. It won't keep you warm unless it's already relatively warm outside. Due to the materials, this hoodie has a slight sheen. It's subtle. If you purchase this thinking it will have a matte finish like cotton does... you will be disappointed! You've been warned.  I vibe with this hoodie. I love the punchy red color! I would give this five stars 5/5 but the zipper is terrible! This zipper is very snatchy and jerky. It doesn't feel cheap like it will derail, BUT it is so rough when you attempt to zip it that you have to wrestle the zipper up one inch at a time! And that's a horrible user experience.  This is the type of zipper that makes you fear you're gonna catch the skin of your neck in it as you zip up sending yourself to the hospital because you can't unzip the skin of your neck back out. haha! This is the type of zipper that will anger you if you're in a rush trying to get out the door and all you need to do is zip up and head out but you're stuck at the front door arm wrestling the zipper for minutes while your Uber driver drives off without you. HAHA! I'm not kidding.  As much as I'm frustrated with this zipper situation, I'll probably wear this a lot because overall, visually it's a cool accent hoodie with its graffiti text and all!

I got this hoodie for my daughter who has been wearing it a few times. I've actually stolen it a couple of times because it is soft. The fabric is a little thin but it's not very cold so I don't see it needing to be thicker. We have no issues with the letters or stitching on the fabric. It's a quality sweater that is getting lots of love. If we keep fighting over it I may need to order another one because I went to grab it this am and she wore it to school.
Good value for your money, very comfortable, fits good, good material!

So it looks nice and trendy but the quality is very low. Probably the worst quality zipper i’ve ever seen. It’s a huge struggle to get it to go up and down, and will probably break very soon. The material is thin and not the greatest quality either. It does look like the photos and is trendy but i’m disappointed in the quality and probably won’t wear it much. Wouldn’t recommend honestly.
love the design.
This jacket is sooo cute and the pastel pink is just everything. I love the material and it fits true to size. Can’t wait to wear this I love it.
Good sweat shirt.  Inside is super soft and thr colors are vibrant. Keeps warm nicely.
Graphics are great. Comfortable, true to size and good quality fabric.
Ordered for myself. I love it! Gorgeous color. Very soft. Great fit.
its a good hoodie, feels comfortable and fits OK.
